changed_pass: Your password has been successfully changed
rus_hello_1: Hello. We see that you are from the Russian Federation. Unfortunately, registration in Zomro is currently unavailable for citizens of the Russian Federation. You can buy services from another hosting company:
rus_hello_2: This is the official partner of zomro.com in Russia.

warnings.blocked_ip: The limit for the number of unsuccessful login attempts has been exceeded, you can contact support SUPPORT@ZOMRO.COM
warnings.auth_error: Server is temporarily unavailable, please try again later
warnings.invalid_pass: The password must be between {{min}} and {{max}} characters, upper and lower case latin letters and numbers.
warnings.max_email_send_time: You have exceeded the maximum number of password reset attempts. Please try again in 24 hours, or contact Technical support.
warnings.min_email_send_timeout: You can request the password reset key in {{time}}
warnings.check_3: You have exceeded the maximum number of attempts to enter the code
warnings.err: Password reset link is invalid or expired. Try to restore the password again
warnings.email_exist: This email is already registered in the system.
warnings.social_akk_registered: This account {{value}} of a social network is already linked 'BILLmanager' user. If you want to tie a new user, using these registration data, at first execute their untying from the existing user. Then repeat procedure of a binding.
warnings.soc_email_exist: This email is already registered in the system. If you forgot your password, please use the password recovery form.
warnings.soc_net_not_integrated: The {{value}} network account and control panel account are not integrated. Please, log in using your username and password.
warnings.no_email_from_social: The 'Email address' field has an invalid value. The value cannot be empty. Please add your email address to your social network account and then re-register
warnings.blocklogon: Your account has been blocked for 20 seconds
warnings.blockgeoip: Your account has been blocked because you are logging in from a new region. Unlock instructions have been sent to your email

reset.description_1: Enter an email address for password recovery. If you don't remember your email, contact our Technical support team via
reset.description_2: . Provide your name, surname, and phone number that you specified during registration.
reset.confirm_descr_1: Password recovery information was sent to {{email}} Follow the instructions in the email. If you didn't receive the email, pass the recovery process once again.
reset.confirm_descr_2: If you cannot restore a password to your account, please contact our Technical support team
reset.confirm_descr_3: . Please, provide your name, surname, and phone number that you entered during registration.
reset.maxRequestError: You have exceeded the maximum number of password reset attempts. Please try again in 24 hours, or contact Technical support.

verification.text: A six-digit one-time code generated by Google Authenticator Please make sure that the time and time zone on your cell phone are correct.
verification.label: Temporary code:
